file.dragAndDrop: Drag and drop a file here, or click to select

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.subtitle: Stay updated with your latest notifications

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure app-wide settings for document generation and formatting
settings.documentPrefixesDesc: Configure the prefixes used for document numbering
settings.documentSettingsDesc: Configure document numbering and formatting options
settings.financialSettingsDesc: Configure default tax rates and currency settings
settings.decimalPlacesDesc: Number of decimal places for amounts
settings.itemsPerPageDesc: Number of items to display per page in lists
settings.defaultTaxRateDesc: Default tax rate for new documents
settings.managerApprovalLimitDesc: Maximum invoice amount a Manager can sign (default: 20000)
settings.pdfBusinessRulesDesc: Configure PDF generation and business validation rules
settings.defaultPaymentTermsDesc: Default payment deadline for invoices in days (e.g., 30 = due in 30 days)
settings.allowFutureDatesDesc: Whether to allow future dates in documents
settings.defaultQuoteValidityDesc: Default validity period for quotes in days (e.g., 30 = valid for 30 days)

validation.identifiantFiscalMustBe8Chars: Identifiant Fiscal must be exactly 8 characters long.
validation.verificationDocumentSize: File size must be less than 10MB.
validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
validation.passwordUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
validation.passwordLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
validation.passwordDigit: Password must contain at least one digit.
validation.passwordSpecial: Password must contain at least one non-alphanumeric character.

auth.tokenRefreshFailed: Session expired. Please log in again.

emailUnverified.title: Email Verification Required
emailUnverified.message: Please check your email and click the verification link to activate your account.

emailConfirmed.title: Email Confirmed!
emailConfirmed.successMessage: Your email has been successfully verified. You can now sign in to your account.
emailConfirmed.errorMessage: There was a problem verifying your email address. Please try again or contact support.

pendingVerification.title: Your application is under review
pendingVerification.message: We are still verifying the authenticity of your company data and uploaded documents. This process typically takes 24-48 hours.

companyRejected.title: Company Verification Rejected
companyRejected.message: Your company verification was not successful. Please review the feedback below, update your information if needed, and resubmit your documents.
companyRejected.submissionMessage: Your company information has been updated and documents resubmitted. Your application is now under review again.
companyRejected.updateSuccess: Company information updated successfully. Your documents have been resubmitted for review.
companyRejected.step2: Update your company information if needed

inactive.title: Account Inactive
inactive.message: Your account has been deactivated. Please contact support for assistance.

errors.title: Error
errors.somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.

errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
errors.unauthorized: Unauthorized access. Please log in again.

errors.taxIdAlreadyExists: This Tax ID is already registered.

errors.validationFailed: Please fix the validation errors below.

errors.tryRefreshing: Try refreshing the page or contact support if the problem persists.
errors.sectionError: Something went wrong in this section.
errors.failedToFetch: Failed to fetch. Please check your connection and try again.
errors.failedToFetchJSON: Failed to fetch JSON. Make sure Compliance Mode is enabled.

reject.title: Reject Verification

deactivate.message: Please provide a reason for deactivating this company.

topDebtors.title: Top 5 Debtors
topDebtors.emailSubject: Reminder: Overdue Balance on Your Account
topDebtors.emailBody:
Dear [Customer Name],

This is a friendly reminder that your account has an overdue balance totaling [Amount Due].

Please review your account or contact us if you have any questions.

Best regards,

[Your Company Name]

form.vatExemptionReasonPlaceholder: Enter the legal justification for VAT exemption (e.g., 'Exonération sans droit à déduction - Article 91 du CGI')
form.vatExemptionNote: When VAT exempt is selected, all line items will automatically have 0% tax rate and you must provide a legal justification.
form.vatExemptionNoteDetail: This ensures compliance with tax regulations and provides proper documentation for audits.
form.vatExemptionHint: Check this box if your invoice is exempt from VAT and provide the legal justification below.
form.paymentReferencePlaceholder: Enter check number, transfer ID, etc.
form.paymentReferenceHint: Optional: Additional reference for the payment method (e.g., check number, transfer ID)

errors.signatureCreationFailed: Could not create the signature. The selected certificate may be expired or invalid. Please select another certificate or contact support.
errors.signatureVerificationFailed: The server could not verify your signature. Please refresh the page to ensure you are signing the latest version of the invoice and try again. If the problem persists, please contact support.

errors.connectionFailed: Failed to connect to signing helper app. Please ensure the digital signing helper app is running.

errors.signatureCreationError: Could not create the signature. Please ensure the digital signing helper app is running.

help.title: CSV Import Format
help.description: The file must be in CSV format with the following headers on the first line. The order of columns does not matter.
optionalFields: ClientNom - Customer name (only used to name a new customer if their ClientICE is not found in the database)

import.title: Import Catalog Items
import.description: Import multiple catalog items from a CSV file
import.instructions: Download the template and fill it with your catalog data
import.success: {{imported}} items imported successfully out of {{total}} total

error.title: Import Error
error.message: Some items could not be imported. Please check the details below:

help.title: CSV Import Format
help.description: The file must be in CSV format with the following headers on the first line. The order of columns does not matter.
requiredFields: Name - The name of the item or service.
Unit Price - The selling price before taxes.
optionalFields: Article Code - The unique code for the item. Leave empty if not applicable.
Description - A detailed description of the item.
VAT Rate - The VAT rate as a percentage (e.g., 20 for 20%). If omitted, the default value is 0.
Type - The item type. Must be the text Product or Service. If omitted, the default value is Service.
